body_html:
you dont have 4 GPUs, looks like it.

CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1,2,3 python train.py

This means it will try to use GPU2, 3, 4
Change this appropriately depending on the number of GPUs you have.
You can check number of GPUs with the command nvidia-smi

body:
you dont have 4 GPUs, looks like it. 

```
CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1,2,3 python train.py
```
This means it will try to use GPU2, 3, 4
Change this appropriately depending on the number of GPUs you have.
You can check number of GPUs with the command `nvidia-smi`
